statement.p: Explain how to find the dimension of W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{\left[\begin{array}{r} 3 \\ -2 \\ 1 \\ -1 \\ -3 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -4 \\ 2 \\ -2 \\ 3 \\ -1 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 19 \\ -10 \\ 9 \\ -13 \\ 1 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 47 \\ -24 \\ 23 \\ -34 \\ 8 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -4 \\ -2 \\ -3 \\ 1 \\ 3 \end{array}\right]\right\}.
